name: Bike Heroes - Play Free 8-bit Pixel Moto Racing Games
name_original: Bike Heroes - Play Free 8-bit Pixel Moto Racing Games
description:
Bike Heroes are riding in the city…

Game Features:

* 8-bit art style and retro look
* Play with just one tap
* Very fast and challenging game play
* Easy to play, but hard to master
* Game Center integrated for more fun
* FREE... everything is there at no price

You may think it’s just another running, flying, jumping, or endless race game. But this nice tiny indie game is a bit different…
